meanings.definition: A person who practices niello work.
meanings.sent1: The niellists in the workshop carefully crafted intricate designs on silver jewelry.
meanings.sent2: The group of niellists displayed their beautiful creations at the art fair.
meanings.sent3: The niellists had a friendly competition to see who could create the most detailed piece.
meanings.sent4: The niellists' hands moved with precision, like artists painting on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The art of niello work was brought to life by the skilled niellists.

meanings.sent1: At the exhibition, the niellists stood proudly next to their masterpieces.
meanings.sent2: The niellists gathered to share techniques and inspire each other in their craft.
meanings.sent3: The niellists formed a club to support and encourage new members in the art form.
meanings.sent4: The room buzzed with creativity as the niellists worked on their individual projects.
meanings.sent5: The community of niellists grew stronger as they shared their passion for niello work.
